description: List the candidates created for the job.

parameters.name: AutoMLJobName
parameters.description: List the candidates created for the job by providing the job's name.

nested_items.name: Candidates
nested_items.description: Summaries about the AutoMLCandidates.

nested_items.name: CandidateName
nested_items.description: The name of the candidate.

nested_items.name: FinalAutoMLJobObjectiveMetric
nested_items.description: The best candidate result from an AutoML training job.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of metric with the best result.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the metric with the best result. For a description of the possible objective metrics, see AutoMLJobObjective$MetricName.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the metric with the best result.

nested_items.name: StandardMetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the standard metric. For a description of the standard metrics, see Autopilot candidate metrics.

nested_items.name: ObjectiveStatus
nested_items.description: The objective's status.

nested_items.name: CandidateSteps
nested_items.description: Information about the candidate's steps.

nested_items.name: CandidateStepType
nested_items.description: Whether the candidate is at the transform, training, or processing step.

nested_items.name: CandidateStepArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the candidate's step.

nested_items.name: CandidateStepName
nested_items.description: The name for the candidate's step.

nested_items.name: CandidateStatus
nested_items.description: The candidate's status.

nested_items.name: InferenceContainers
nested_items.description: Information about the recommended inference container definitions.

nested_items.name: Image
nested_items.description: The Amazon Elastic Container Registry (Amazon ECR) path of the container. For more information, see ContainerDefinition.

nested_items.name: ModelDataUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the model artifacts. For more information, see ContainerDefinition.

nested_items.name: Environment
nested_items.description: The environment variables to set in the container. For more information, see ContainerDefinition.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last modified time.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The failure reason.

nested_items.name: CandidateProperties
nested_items.description: The properties of an AutoML candidate job.

nested_items.name: CandidateArtifactLocations
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 prefix to the artifacts generated for an AutoML candidate.

nested_items.name: Explainability
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 prefix to the explainability artifacts generated for the AutoML candidate.

nested_items.name: ModelInsights
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 prefix to the model insight artifacts generated for the AutoML candidate.

nested_items.name: BacktestResults
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 prefix to the accuracy metrics and the inference results observed over the testing window. Available only for the time-series forecasting problem type.

nested_items.name: CandidateMetrics
nested_items.description: Information about the candidate metrics for an AutoML job.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the metric.

nested_items.name: StandardMetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the standard metric.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the metric.

nested_items.name: Set
nested_items.description: The dataset split from which the AutoML job produced the metric.

nested_items.name: InferenceContainerDefinitions
nested_items.description: The mapping of all supported processing unit (CPU, GPU, etc--¦) to inference container definitions for the candidate. This field is populated for the AutoML jobs V2 (for example, for jobs created by calling CreateAutoMLJobV2) related to image or text classification problem types only.

nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.description: The Amazon Elastic Container Registry (Amazon ECR) path of the container. For more information, see ContainerDefinition.

nested_items.name: ModelDataUrl
nested_items.description: The location of the model artifacts. For more information, see ContainerDefinition.

nested_items.name: Environment
nested_items.description: The environment variables to set in the container. For more information, see ContainerDefinition.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous response was truncated, you receive this token. Use it in your next request to receive the next set of results.
